verbs.description: Jessica Corbett at Common Dreams writes— Decrying Trump 's ' Cruel ' Refusal to Act , Warren and Markey Unveil [ARG0: Bill] to [V: Help] [ARG1: Puerto Ricans Left Homeless by Maria] : Just before hurricane season ...
